Lots of fun. Met a bunch of cool dudes who I  play with regularly. 
The matches are fun. few cheaters here and there.

Why is 10 v 10 Comp Clan matches not a thing yet? 
Please add this and Clans can rank too as well maybe have a leader-board just for clans. 

All in all a good game nonetheless with the right people it becomes a daily game you can join and have fun with friends.
